Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great coffee place in city center of amsterdam. Reasonable prices and delicious coffee. Amazing selection of sweets, I loved red velvet cake. Try pear juice! So good üòä highly recommend! I love the interior too!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Really nice experience. The service is great and the cakes were good. Cosy mood, perfect to get warm again after a cold day in center Amsterdam.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Was recommended to visit by a friend; the coffee is divine & the smashed avo on toast met all expectations for a quick brunch stop!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great little spot that makes good coffee. There are pastries and other things on offer that look great but I did not try any. Interior is lovely and chic and there is an nice outdoor area for people watching.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Fabulous coffee, but a 25 min wait for the waiter to bring banana bread and avocado toasties is ridiculous. It shouldn‚Äôt take so long. They kept on serving new customers ignoring our order until I had to remind them about us. They forgot about one item as well. The food was good though.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: A modern and cozy coffee shop on the Elandsgracht, this is one of my favourite spots. Staff is always super friendly even during the busiest times. Great coffee, desserts, and sandwiches. And if you're an early bird, the fresh baked croissants in the morning are absolutely delicious.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Cozy, stylish place with great coffee and food.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: It is such a stunning place, so much atmosphere in this lovely establishment. Nice staff as well. When it comes to espresso ... let's say the new way of espresso, way to acid for me, like the italian style. If you like the new style this is the place to go.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: The coffee is just amazing, really the best in Amsterdam. The vibe of the place is indescribable, you need to go and see it for yourself! People are so friendly and kind, really amazing. I had the beat avocado toast with the best flat white ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Awesome ambient, very good music and delicious cake.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Best breakfast experience in Amsterdam so far. Nice range of breakfast with good coffee and friendly staff. A modern layout with an artistic twist.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Nice interior and okay coffee. But so overpriced! The title ‚Äòbreakfast to the max‚Äô is quite pretentious for only a croissant, a small cup of yoghurt and a very watery, tasteless pear juice. But it‚Äôs in a touristy neighbourhood, so they can probably just get away with it.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Really nice place and excellent coffee. Black people are also served here which is great.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Lovely spot, their capuccino is fabulous. I had the smashed avocado sandwich, it was delicious. Staff is really nice, I'll definitely come back!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Cool place with skilled staff. Excellent oatcookies. Pretty tiny (boxes with supplies on the ground were a bit messy), but very stylish ambiance. Would recommend. 10/10

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Forever the best coffee place in amsterdam. Amazing owner, staff and interior + coffee.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Amazing coffee, service, and brownie 20/20 would come back again

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text:
Lovely place, very cozy! We stayed there for at least two hours and had a cappuccino and a carrot/ginger juice (very nice!:))
The staff was also especially friendly!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: best coffee in the town. baristas are professionals, prices are ok. might be improved ordering system because its a mess

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Cosy little spot on the busy Elansgracht. Nice coffee and a good selection of goodies to go with it. The vegan chocolate cake is a nice accompliment to the coffee. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Perfect flat white.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Really nice and cozy space, good music,  delicious sunrise croissant and granola with yoghurt and fruits. Highly recommend:)

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Such a great little spot to come in and relax. Great location, and the coffee is fantastic. Would go back any day.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Good coffeebeans and nice flatwhite but brownie is too sweet! And attitude of staffs is not nice ....

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Unexpectedly good coffee so close to the city center, small cafe so sometimes you're lucky with a good spot or you need to wait for it, but worth it! ‚òïÔ∏è

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Lovely little Caf√© with a small selection of really tasty food! Also really nice & kind staff! :-)

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: They have some lovely food and some great coffee

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Friendly staff and great coffee/muesli. On my visit the staff actually forgot my order, however, were very apologetic and made up for it.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text:
Had wonderful service and a delicious waffle with all the egg and everything else I wanted!
Great spot!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Amazing coffee shop in Amsterdam! Food was delicious, coffee and juices excelent! But the best part was the people who worked there, really welcoming and happy. Definitely a must go in Amsterdam üíòü§©

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great coffee. Food offering, as with most of Amsterdam, can be hit and miss but the smashed avo was great. Would definitely visit again.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Excellent cafe with great drinks and treats at reasonable prices!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: One of those Amsterdam places that skillfully blends not-bad-not-great coffee with the delicate art of incremental price gouging. ‚Ç¨15 for a black coffee, a chai thing and two pastries (‚Ç¨4 for a cinnamon roll!) is definitely in outrageous territory.  Hooray for hipster tax!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Fantastic flat whites and nice limited sandwich and breakfast menu. Sometimes too busy for a seat but you'll always be made to feel welcome by the staff.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Delicious coffee. You can tell they use freshly roasted beans.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Excellent coffee. Super nice staff! Totally worth a stop

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: We found this place whilst strolling around Amsterdam last weekend and what a great find it was! Coffee and juices and healthy snacks all expertly made in front of you by someone who, it is clear to see, takes huge pride in their work as ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Coffees fine - apple juice is fine - service is quick but  outside seats taken by staff stitting on their laptop and phones...I was with my 2 girls cramming ourselves on to a small bench until some other seats became available.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: The coffee is good, but not worthy going there as the staff is unprofessional, arrogant, don‚Äôt respect the ‚Äúfirst in first out‚Äù and the prices are extremely high. Totally a no-go. There‚Äôs a lot more places in the neighborhood where the service is great, coffee is great and way cheaper.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Very good coffee, a real surprise to find a real coffee bar in Amsterdam, even the Espresso Macchiato, something you can hardly find outside Italy. Well done. Price aligned with the competition, maybe a little lower, but the service with the smile is really really appreciated!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: The croissant was delicious. The coffee was ok+ The Asian lady could be friendlier

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great coffee. Food offering, as with most of Amsterdam, can be hit and miss but the smashed avo was great. Would definitely visit again.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Cosy little spot on the busy Elansgracht. Nice coffee and a good selection of goodies to go with it. The vegan chocolate cake is a nice accompliment to the coffee. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Fantastic flat whites and nice limited sandwich and breakfast menu. Sometimes too busy for a seat but you'll always be made to feel welcome by the staff.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Good coffee, nice people, delicious baked goods and super cozy!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: We had a really delicious iced coffee (Americano) and an iced latte there. Super good!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: A nice coffee spot close to the center of the city. The decoration is modern, the coffee has a good quality and the stuff is friendly. The only downside might be that the place is very small.

Name: Koffiespot

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Excellent coffee, worth the detour

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: I love this place. They have a super nice coffee, and the environment is perfect to take a moment. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Coffee was solid, atmosphere chill. Good mix of locals and tourists. Always hard to find a decent coffee spot on vacation but this place was great.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text:
Coffee is above average & prepared well... paired with a good selection of sweets and artisinal looking muesli bars.
I liked this place. Very chill indeed.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Nice place. Quality coffee from Bocca Roasters. But what sticks in my mind is that rather small, out-of-this-world brownie -- the most delicious brownie I've ever tasted.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: First great coffee I've had since arriving in Amsterdam 3 days ago. Fab vibe, great food, vegan options and fresh juice all amazing.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: We had a really delicious iced coffee (Americano) and an iced latte there. Super good!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great and friendly staff, good place to work on your laptop, although quite noisy and busy. The food is delicious, and coffee is good quality!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Fantastic coffee and delicious Sunrise Croissant with great customer service. I'm looking forward to trying out the fresh juices!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great coffee. Small locally owned place.  Good wireless connection allows you to sit down and connect with social media.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Good coffee, nice people, delicious baked goods and super cozy!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Very bad customer service unfortunately. Neither care about their customers nor about doing their part regarding Corona distancing rules. Sad. This used to be a good spot.

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Great vibe, great eats! Best dirty chai ever! The toasts (panini) are great as well. Interesting baked goods and friendly staff too!

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Best coffee and banana bread in town. The only annoying thing is that I always have troubles connecting to their Wifi, and the mobile internet is not working in the building either

Name: Koffiespot
Review Text: Cosy and good ambiance. Coffees are really tasty. I keenly recommend sugar-free banana bread.
